title: HTML
description: HTML is the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser. It can be assisted by technologies such as Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) and scripting languages such as JavaScript.

title: CSS Fundamentals
description: Learn the fundamentals of CSS to style web pages and create visually appealing designs. Covers selectors, properties, layouts, and animations.

title: JavaScript Basics
description: A beginner-friendly course covering JavaScript fundamentals, including variables, loops, functions, and event handling.

title: React for Beginners
description: An introduction to React.js, covering components, state management, and hooks to build interactive user interfaces.

title: Node.js and Express
description: Learn how to build server-side applications using Node.js and Express.js. Covers RESTful APIs, middleware, and database integration.

title: Full-Stack
description: A comprehensive course covering both frontend and backend technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and databases.

title: Vue.js Basics
description: Learn the basics of Vue.js, including components, directives, and the Vue CLI to build dynamic web applications.

title: SASS Mastery
description: Master the powerful CSS preprocessor SASS to write more efficient, scalable, and maintainable stylesheets.

title: MongoDB Basics
description: An introduction to MongoDB, a NoSQL database. Learn how to set up and manage collections, documents, and queries.

title: PHP for Beginners
description: Learn the basics of PHP, a popular server-side scripting language used for web development and building dynamic websites.

title: Advanced JavaScript
description: Take your JavaScript skills to the next level by learning about closures, promises, asynchronous programming, and design patterns.

title: Laravel for Backend Development
description: Learn how to build powerful web applications using the Laravel PHP framework, including routing, Eloquent ORM, and RESTful APIs.

title: Python for Data Science
description: Learn the fundamentals of Python for Data Science, covering libraries such as NumPy, Pandas, and Matplotlib for data analysis.

title: Django for Web Development
description: Learn how to build web applications with Django, a high-level Python web framework. Covers routing, templates, and database integration.

title: WordPress Development
description: Learn how to build websites using WordPress, including theme and plugin development and customizing the WordPress admin interface.

title: Angular Fundamentals
description: An introduction to Angular, covering components, services, and dependency injection to build dynamic, single-page applications.

title: Mobile App Development with Flutter
description: Learn to build cross-platform mobile apps using Flutter. Covers widgets, navigation, and creating beautiful user interfaces.

title: Cloud Computing Basics
description: Learn the fundamentals of cloud computing and how to use cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud for building scalable applications.

title: Artificial Intelligence with Python
description: Learn how to implement machine learning algorithms and neural networks using Python, along with libraries like TensorFlow and scikit-learn.

title: Blockchain Development
description: Learn how to build decentralized applications using blockchain technology, smart contracts, and Ethereum.
